name: Virtual Art Gallery
description:
My very first game, this is a small 5-10 mins horror game and this is definitely not a rip off of corpsepile's 'open house' .  A journalist has been investigating a series of murders which leads him to an application named virtual art gallery. This is where you as a player start playing the game. This is a very short horror 'experience'. The whole game took about 30 - 40 days (due to college work and part time job I wasn't able to focus on the project, even though this game is just an asset flip).

First Person Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Look Around

Right Mouse Button - Zoom

W + LShift - Run

E - Interact

Point & Click Controls:

Well point & click to move to position.

E - Zoom
